com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.util
Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.unit.Manager
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.util.EntityManager

public class EntityManager
extends Manager

EntityManager is a Manager that is responsible for managing all the IEntity in the game world.

EntityManager is responsible for all aspects of entity management including entity creation, retrieving and destruction.

EntityManager maintains all the entities by their ID number. This allows multiple entities with the same type defined by EEntity exist. Positive ID numbers are assigned by the server and negative ID numbers are assigned by the client. Entities with negative ID numbers are usually static environment entities.

Version:
Creation date: 06-05-2008 11:15 EST, Modified date: 08-12-2008 11:16 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Clears the EntityManager by first clear the entity pool the reset the ID number count to 0. This method should be invoked whenever a new World is loaded.

Specified by:
cleanup in class Manager
